unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Are Ranbir and Alia expecting baby No. 2?!**
normalised: **entertainment buzz: are ranbir and alia expecting baby number two?!**

unnormalised: Bollywood's grapevine is buzzing! Rumours are swirling faster than a Mumbai local at 09:00 hrs, suggesting Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt might be expecting their second child. Fans went into a frenzy after Alia was spotted outside Lilavati Hospital on 22/07/2024, looking a bit...shall we say, glowy?

unnormalised: While neither has officially confirmed, sources close to the couple are staying mum, adding fuel to the fire. Remember how tight-lipped they were before Raha was born? Seems like history might be repeating itself!
normalised: while neither has officially confirmed, sources close to the couple are staying mum, adding fuel to the fire. remember how tight-lipped they were before raha was born? seems like history might be repeating itself!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora's relationship status remains a mystery. Spotted having dinner together at Bastian on 10/08/2024 at 20:00 hrs, they looked pretty cozy. Are they back on? Or just remaining friends after their alleged split? The plot thickens! Guess we'll have to wait and see what unfolds. Keep your eyes peeled, Bollywood buffs! More gossip coming your way soon, maybe even by 17/08/2024!
